reporting_cycle: Secretary-General reports not explicitly mentioned, but Panel of Experts to provide midterm report by 9 November 2012 and final report by 30 days prior to termination of mandate
summary:
The Security Council,
 
Recalling previous relevant resolutions and statements, 
Recalling creation of a Panel of Experts under resolution 1929 (2010),
Recalling interim and final reports of the Panel of Experts,
 
1. Extends until 9 July 2013 the mandate of the Panel of Experts as specified in resolution 1929 (2010), and requests the Secretary-General to take necessary administrative measures.
2. Requests midterm report by 9 November 2012 and final report 30 days prior to termination of mandate.
3. Requests a planned programme of work from the Panel within 30 days of reappointment.
4. Expresses intent to follow the Panel's work.
5. Urges cooperation with the Committee and Panel of Experts.
6. Decides to remain seized of the matter.
